description._content: Collection: Human Ecology Historical Photographs Title: Farm Home Market at which were sold foods and crafts made at home on the farms of New York State. This was developed in cooperation with the New York State Federation of Home Bureaus, State Department of Agriculture and Markets, and the New York State Colleges of Agriculture and Home Economics. The model roadside stand was built by the State Department of Agriculture and Markets as part of its educational program from plans worked out by representatives from the department and representatives of the State Colleges. The sales were conducted by the New York State Federation of Home Bureaus. Collection #23-2-749, item H-HBA-06 Div. Rare & Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library Persistent URI: http://hdl.handle.net/1813.001/5x3j There are no known U.S. copyright restrictions on this image. The digital file is owned by the Cornell University Library which is making it freely available with the request that, when possible, the Library be credited as its source.
